languages.text: "Ох... Яд течет по механическим венам... Путь к цели покажется легким, пока не повернешь назад. В железном сердце бушует пламя..."
"Oh... Poison runs through mechanical veins... The path to your goal seems easy as long as you do not turn back. Fire rages in an iron heart..."
languages.original_text: "Ох... Яд течет по механическим венам... Путь к цели покажется легким, пока не повернешь назад. В железном сердце бушует пламя..."

traits.locale_text: "Oh... Poison runs through mechanical veins... The path to your goal seems easy as long as you do not turn back. Fire rages in an iron heart..."
"Oh... Poison runs through mechanical veins... The path to your goal seems easy as long as you do not turn back. Fire rages in an iron heart..."
"Oh... Poison runs through mechanical veins... The path to your goal seems easy as long as you do not turn back. Fire rages in an iron heart..."
"Oh... Poison runs through mechanical veins... The path to your goal seems easy as long as you do not turn back. Fire rages in an iron heart..."

languages.text: “噢……机械的血管中流淌着毒液……只要别回头，通往目标的道路看起来便会四平八稳。火焰在钢铁的心脏中熊熊燃烧……”
languages.original_text: "Oh... Poison runs through mechanical veins... The path to your goal seems easy as long as you do not turn back. Fire rages in an iron heart..."

traits.locale_text: “噢……机械的血管中流淌着毒液……只要别回头，通往目标的道路看起来便会四平八稳。火焰在钢铁的心脏中熊熊燃烧……”

languages.text: «Oh... El veneno corre por venas mecánicas... El camino al objetivo parece fácil siempre que no se eche la mirada atrás. Las llamas rugen en un corazón de hierro...».
languages.original_text: "Oh... Poison runs through mechanical veins... The path to your goal seems easy as long as you do not turn back. Fire rages in an iron heart..."

traits.locale_text: «Oh... El veneno corre por venas mecánicas... El camino al objetivo parece fácil siempre que no se eche la mirada atrás. Las llamas rugen en un corazón de hierro...».

languages.text: 「ああ…毒が機械の血管を駆け巡る…引き返さぬ限り、目的地への道はたやすく見える。炎が鉄の心臓を震え立たせる…」
languages.original_text: "Oh... Poison runs through mechanical veins... The path to your goal seems easy as long as you do not turn back. Fire rages in an iron heart..."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ…毒が機械の血管を駆け巡る…引き返さぬ限り、目的地への道はたやすく見える。炎が鉄の心臓を震え立たせる…」

languages.text: "Oh ... Gift fließt durch mechanische Venen ... Der Pfad zu Eurem Ziel scheint einfach zu sein, solange Ihr nicht umkehrt. Feuer wütet in einem ehernen Herz ..."
languages.original_text: "Oh... Poison runs through mechanical veins... The path to your goal seems easy as long as you do not turn back. Fire rages in an iron heart..."

traits.locale_text: "Oh ... Gift fließt durch mechanische Venen ... Der Pfad zu Eurem Ziel scheint einfach zu sein, solange Ihr nicht umkehrt. Feuer wütet in einem ehernen Herz ..."

languages.text: « Oh... Du poison coule dans les veines mécaniques... Le chemin menant à l'objectif paraît facile tant qu'on ne regarde pas en arrière. Le feu brûle dans un cœur de fer... »
languages.original_text: "Oh... Poison runs through mechanical veins... The path to your goal seems easy as long as you do not turn back. Fire rages in an iron heart..."

traits.locale_text: « Oh... Du poison coule dans les veines mécaniques... Le chemin menant à l'objectif paraît facile tant qu'on ne regarde pas en arrière. Le feu brûle dans un cœur de fer... »

languages.text: "Ah... Mekanik damarlardan zehir akıyor. Hedefine giden yol, geri dönmediğin sürece kolay görünüyor. Demirden bir kalpte ateşler yanıyor..."
languages.original_text: "Oh... Poison runs through mechanical veins... The path to your goal seems easy as long as you do not turn back. Fire rages in an iron heart..."
